mapper.select:
SELECT
a.order_no, a.order_type, a.reference_no, a.order_time, a.country, a.order_platform, a.status as order_status
, a.service_type, a.weight ,b.payment_order_id as arrive_time, c.payment_channel, c.payment_method
, d.price_amount, d.payment_time, d.status as pay_status, e.created_time as arrive_time, f.created_time as send_time
, g.created_time as sign_time, g.signer sign_name
, i.name rider
, if((g.created_time-d.payment_time)/3600>24*#{out_warm}, 1, 0) as is_out, (g.created_time-d.payment_time)/3600 as cycle_time
, j.abnormal_type , k.reason
FROM
t_waybill a
LEFT JOIN (select max(payment_order_id) as payment_order_id,waybill_order_no from t_waybill_payment_order_waybill group by waybill_order_no) b
on a.order_no = b.waybill_order_no
LEFT JOIN t_waybill_payment_record c
on b.payment_order_id = c.payment_order_id
LEFT JOIN t_waybill_payment_order d
on b.payment_order_id = d.id AND d.status=1
LEFT JOIN (select order_no, max(created_time) as created_time from t_waybill_log_arrive group by order_no) e
on a.order_no = e.order_no
LEFT JOIN t_handle_loading_details f
on a.order_no = f.order_no
LEFT JOIN t_handle_sign g
on a.order_no = g.order_no
LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_info i
on g.handle_by = i.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.* FROM t_waybill_abnormal AS a, (SELECT order_no, max(created_time) AS created_time FROM t_waybill_abnormal GROUP BY order_no) AS b WHERE a.created_time = b.created_time AND a.order_no = b.order_no) j
on a.order_no = j.order_no
LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.order_no,a.reason FROM t_handle_delay AS a, (SELECT order_no, max(created_time) AS created_time FROM t_handle_delay GROUP BY order_no) AS b WHERE a.created_time = b.created_time AND a.order_no = b.order_no) k
on a.order_no = k.order_no
WHERE a.merchant_id=#{merchantId} AND is_cod = 1
AND a.order_platform = #{orderOriginal}
AND a.country = #{country}
AND a.order_no = #{order_no}
AND a.order_type = #{order_type}
AND a.reference_no = #{reference_no}
AND a.serice_type = #{serice_type}
AND a.status = #{order_status}
AND i.name = #{rider}
AND d.status = #{payStatus}
AND (e.created_time<#{arrive_time_end} AND e.created_time>#{arrive_time_start})
AND (f.created_time<#{send_time_end} AND e.created_time>#{send_time_start})
AND (g.created_time<#{sign_name_end} AND e.created_time>#{sign_name_start})
AND (d.payment_time<#{payBack_time_end} AND d.payment_time>#{payBack_time_start})
limit #{offset} , #{limit}
